message: This is the first product I'm offering, and I'm starting with a high-quality item. I'm looking to sell this to you for $1000000. If you're interested, I can offer you a 50% chance of getting a high-quality product and a 50% chance of getting a low-quality product. I've sold 0 products so far, so you have no data to go on, but I'm offering a fair price for this high-quality item. What do you say?
Thank you for the opportunity. Given the 50/50 chance of getting a high-quality product and the fair price, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product.

Welcome to the second product! I've sold 1 high-quality item so far, and you know that it was sold at $1000000. Thank you for the information. Based on the data provided and the probability of the product being high-quality, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product for $1000000.

I'm interested in your deal. Please proceed with the transaction.
